title: Dilute Birman--Wenzl--Murakami Algebra and $D^{(2)}_{n+1}$ models
abstract: A ``dilute'' generalisation of the Birman--Wenzl--Murakami algebra is considered. It can be ``Baxterised'' to a solution of the Yang--Baxter algebra. The $D^{(2)}_{n+1}$ vertex models are examples of corresponding solvable lattice models and can be regarded as the dilute version of the $B^{(1)}_{n}$ vertex models.
